content:
/>
IX.ii.1.B.3.h
.
Establishing Controls for the Notice of Proposed Adverse Action Period
Establish a 65-day control for the notice of proposed adverse period in accordance with
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 3.A.3
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B - Aid and Attendance (A&A) Status for Beneficiaries Who Are Patients in a Qualified Nursing Home
citation: Part IX, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B
